column4: i'm trying to install the cx18 driver in the 2.6.31-14-generic-pae/kernel (ubuntu 9.10  32bit) and when i run the make command it is failing. the hard ware i have is a asus p5gc-mx/1333 motherboard, intel dual core 3.0 ghz upc, 4 gigs ram, nvidia 9800gtx+ video card (190.42 driver + vmalloc=512M) Hauppauge HVR-1600 tuner card. ps; i got this card working on ubuntu 9.04  by following this guide ; http://www.mythtv.org/wiki/Hauppauge
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
